column2: How do i cancel my account?
column3:
To cancel your account with Paperspace, you can follow these steps:

1. Log in to your Paperspace account using your email address and password or SSO provider.
2. Once logged in, go to the Billing section of your account settings.
3. Look for a Cancel Account button or link and click on it.
4. Confirm that you want to cancel your account by clicking "Yes" or "Cancel Account" in the confirmation dialog box.
5. Your account will be cancelled and you will no longer be charged for any future usage. However, please note that you will still have access to your instances and data until the end of the current billing period.

If you encounter any issues during the cancellation process or have further questions, you can contact Paperspace support for assistance.

I couldn't find any information about a VPN gateway specifically mentioned in the given text from Paperspace. The text focuses on their cloud computing services, low-cost GPUs, and ease of use for AI development. If you require more detailed information regarding Paperspace's networking options or security features, please let me know, and I can help direct you to the appropriate resources on their website.
